snippet: The Civilian Complaint Review Board argued in State Supreme Court on Friday that jury transcripts are needed to review police actions.
abstract: Staten Island district attorney's office and lawyers representing Civilian Complaint Review Board spar in court over whether district attorney should give board grand jury records related to death of Eric Garner; grand jury declined to indict Officer Daniel Pantaleo for putting Garner in chokehold.
lead_paragraph: The Civilian Complaint Review Board argued in State Supreme Court on Friday that jury transcripts are needed to review police actions.

headline.main: Police Review Board Seeks Grand Jury Records in Eric Garner Case
headline.print_headline: Review Panel Seeks Grand Jury Records in Garner Case
